Seek Protection from the Shadow Curse

Seek Protection from the Shadow Curse is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Seek Protection from the Shadow Curse can be acquired during ACT II and it is a branching subquest for the main questline Infiltrate Moonrise Towers. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3 and earn more loot and experience to become
